entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
